heading: _R.sum
desc: Adds up all the elements of the array

arguments.desc: The array whose sum to be calculated

returns.name: (Number/Array)
returns.desc: Returns a sum/array of sum if array of object is passed

heading: _R.filter
desc: Filters the elements based on the given condition

arguments.desc: The array whose elements needs to be filtered
The object whose keys needs to be filtered

heading: _R.find
desc: Finds the first matched element in the array

arguments.desc: The array where element needs to be find

heading: _R.map
desc: Returns a new array after applying the function

arguments.desc: The array where function needs to be applied
The object where function needs to be applied

heading: _R.merge
desc: Returns a new array after applying the function

arguments.desc: The array where function needs to be applied
The object where function needs to be applied
